item.title: Things to Do
item.description:
Things to Do Near Higgs Homestead

Located just 20 minutes from downtown Fort Worth with easy access to I-35, I-20, and US 287, our homestead puts you in the perfect spot to explore North Texas attractions while enjoying authentic farm life.

On-Site Farm Activities

Meet Our Animals

  • Highland Cow Interactions - Meet Ginger and learn about Highland cattle
  • Mini Horse Visits - Perfect for all ages, our friendly mini horse Snickerdoodle loves attention
  • Farm Fresh Chicken Eggs - Let us know and we can provide you with some farm fresh eggs
  • Farm Tours - Explore all 10 acres with our on-site owners as guides

Fort Worth Attractions (20 minutes away)

Historic & Cultural

  • Fort Worth Stockyards - Historic cattle drives, rodeos, and Western culture
  • Sundance Square - Downtown entertainment district with dining and shopping
  • Kimbell Art Museum - World-renowned art collection in architectural masterpiece
  • Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth - Contemporary art in stunning glass building
  • Amon Carter Museum - American art specializing in Western and contemporary works
  • National Cowgirl Museum - Celebrating women of the American West
  • Fort Worth Museum of Science and History - Interactive exhibits and planetarium
  • Fort Worth Zoo - One of the top zoos in the nation

Entertainment & Events

  • Dickies Arena - Major concerts, sports, and events
  • Billy Bob’s Texas - World’s largest honky-tonk
  • Bass Performance Hall - Broadway shows and performing arts
  • Fort Worth Convention Center - Trade shows and exhibitions

Family Fun

Outdoor Activities

  • Trinity Trails - Miles of hiking and biking paths along the Trinity River
  • Fort Worth Nature Center - Wildlife viewing and nature trails
  • Fort Worth Botanic Garden - Beautiful gardens and peaceful walking paths
  • Lake Worth - Swimming, fishing, and water sports

Professional Sports

  • Dallas Cowboys - NFL games at AT&T Stadium in Arlington (30 minutes)
  • Texas Rangers - MLB games at Globe Life Field in Arlington (30 minutes)
  • Dallas Mavericks - NBA games at American Airlines Center in Dallas (45 minutes)
  • Dallas Stars - NHL games at American Airlines Center in Dallas (45 minutes)
  • Dallas Wings - WNBA games at College Park Center in Arlington (35 minutes)

Attractions & Theme Parks

  • Six Flags Over Texas - Thrilling roller coasters and rides in Arlington (30 minutes)
  • Hurricane Harbor - Water park adjacent to Six Flags (30 minutes)
  • Pirate’s Cove - Waterpark in Burleson (20 minutes)
  • Topgolf - Golf entertainment venue in Fort Worth (20 minutes)

Unique Experiences

  • Texas Motor Speedway - NASCAR races and driving experiences (30 minutes)
  • Historic Grapevine - Wine tasting and charming downtown (25 minutes)

Dining & Shopping

Local Favorites

  • Joe T. Garcia’s - Famous Tex-Mex institution
  • Cattlemen’s Steak House - Authentic steakhouse in the Stockyards
  • Spiral Diner - Plant-based comfort food
  • Clearfork Farmers Market - Fresh Texas produce and artisan goods

Owner’s Favorite Coffee Shops

  • Avoca Coffee - Cozy coffee house off Magnolia Avenue
  • Cherry Coffee - Local favorite on Magnolia Avenue
  • Portico - Great coffee near the Stockyards
  • Cafe Azul - Charming spot near the Stockyards
  • Crude Coffee - Hip coffee shop near South Main
  • Java Lounge - Relaxed atmosphere in Mansfield

Shopping

  • Historic Stockyards - Western wear and unique gifts
  • Sundance Square - Boutiques and specialty shops
  • Clearfork - Upscale shopping center with luxury brands and dining

Seasonal Events

Spring

  • Fort Worth Stock Show & Rodeo - World’s largest indoor rodeo
  • Mayfest - Annual arts festival in Trinity Park

Summer

  • Concerts in the Garden - Fort Worth Botanic Garden
  • Outdoor movies - Various parks throughout the city

Fall

  • State Fair of Texas - Dallas (45 minutes away)
  • Oktoberfest - Various locations in DFW

Winter

  • Holiday lights - Sundance Square and neighborhoods
  • Ice skating - Seasonal rinks in downtown Fort Worth

Getting Around

With our prime location near major highways:
